apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji portrays two men in a loving embrace, with one rendered in a neutral skin tone and the other in a warm, medium-dark hue. A vibrant red heart floats between them, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading that makes it pop with realistic lighting and soft rounded edges. This heartfelt depiction on Apple devices beautifully symbolizes romantic partnership, unity, and affection between two men.
